list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to or denoting the generation of electricity using flowing water (typically from a reservoir held behind a dam or other barrier) to drive a turbine that powers a generator.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: economic and environmental aspect of the hydroelectric scheme
